recipesJson.name: MlNikon's Almond Pound Cake
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description:
Rich, dense, and almondy pound cake with a sweet cream cheese icing for this week's episode on The Mixin Vixens: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wNV072nkGyQ&feature=youtu.be

If you like what we do and want to support us in a fun, tasty way, check out our one shots at flavor jungle: 
https://flavorjungle.com/pages/search-results-page?q=mixing+vixens
